import React from "react"; function Payslip() { const pay = [ { month: "March 2025", Gross: 5000, Deduction: 20, bonus: 19, Net: 4000 }, { month: "February 2025", Gross: 5000, Deduction: 20, bonus: 19, Net: 4000 }, { month: "January 2025", Gross: 5000, Deduction: 20, bonus: 19, Net: 4000 }, { month: "December 2024", Gross: 5000, Deduction: 20, bonus: 19, Net: 4000 }, ]; return (

Payslips

Summary of Salary Payments

{pay.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Department Name Employee ID First Name Last Name Month Net Pay
{item.month} {item.Gross} {item.Deduction} {item.NHIS} {item.pension}
); } export default Payslip;
